xt:extension.xt:author: Alexander Erhard
xt:extension.xt:name: dbTagger

head.title: Plugin for database driven tagging in oXygen

div.p: This oXygen XML Editor plug-in provides pop-up windows to browse database records and paste data into an Author or Text Editor Pane. Request paths, keyboard shortcuts and content insertion templates can be customized in the plug-in's options menu.
